Job Title: Art Director

Location: Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
We're looking for a driven, detail-obsessed art director with a creative mind and amazing taste to join our growing team. The right candidate will take an active role in shaping the visual communication for our clients, from campaigns and branding to video and social media. You’ll be expected to take ownership of the account/s you work with and help push them forward creatively. You’ll also be expected to work with other designers and writers to collaborate on projects and provide feedback and ideas.
This role will be integral in developing brand experiences, creative content, and campaigns.
We are a distributed company, so you will have lots of video meetings, but you can work from pretty much anywhere that has good internet.
Please note: All applicants must have a portfolio of work to be considered.
ResponsibilitiesGenerate clear ideas and concepts across mediaProduce sketches, storyboards, and roughs to visualize ideasUnderstand marketing initiatives, strategic positioning, and target audienceTake work from concept to final executionPresent completed ideas to team members and clientsStay interested in advertising and cultureHelp push your team towards great work
Job Qualifications4-6 years of design/art direction experienceSuperior design and conceptual skillsProficient in Illustrator, Indesign, and PhotoshopExcellent time management & organizational skillsSelf MotivatedExperience in both digital and printStrong problem-solving, communication, and relationship-building skillsAbility to brainstorm in large groups and push ideas forwardA strong portfolio of work
Benefits and PerksAmazing vacation plan401K retirement savings planFlexible working hoursRobust holiday scheduleComprehensive Medical, Dental, and Vision plans
About Plein Air:Plein Air is a marketing and technology consultancy purpose-built for restaurant and hospitality brands. We are a full-service agency with more services than your typical agency. We don’t just stop at media and creative. We dive in at every touch point from the food on the menu to the long-term goals of our clients.
We thrive on an entrepreneurial spirit that allows our employees to jump in and help build new areas of business and offerings based on their own interests.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
